sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './Services.css'; import { FaCode, FaCogs, FaBuilding, FaMobile, FaDatabase, FaCloud, FaJava, FaShoppingCart } from 'react-icons/fa'; import { SiJavascript, SiPython, SiCplusplus, SiPhp, SiRuby, SiGo, SiRust, SiSwift, SiKotlin, SiReact, SiAngular, SiVuedotjs, SiNodedotjs, SiDjango, SiLaravel, SiSpring, SiDotnet, SiMongodb, SiPostgresql, SiMysql, SiRedis, SiDocker, SiKubernetes, SiGooglecloud, SiMicrosoftazure, SiFirebase, SiFlutter, SiIonic, SiOdoo, SiWordpress, SiShopify, SiMagento, SiPrestashop } from 'react-icons/si'; const Services = () => { const handleWhatsAppClick = (serviceName) => { const phoneNumber = '+1234567890'; // Replace with your actual WhatsApp number const message = `Hi! I'm interested in your ${serviceName} service. Can you provide more information?`; const whatsappUrl = `https://wa.me/${phoneNumber}?text=${encodeURIComponent(message)}`; window.open(whatsappUrl, '_blank'); }; const technologies = { programmingLanguages: [ { name: 'JavaScript', icon: , color: '#F7DF1E' }, { name: 'Python', icon: , color: '#3776AB' }, { name: 'Java', icon: , color: '#ED8B00' }, { name: 'C++', icon: , color: '#00599C' }, { name: 'C#', icon: , color: '#512BD4' }, { name: 'PHP', icon: , color: '#777BB4' }, { name: 'Ruby', icon: , color: '#CC342D' }, { name: 'Go', icon: , color: '#00ADD8' }, { name: 'Rust', icon: , color: '#000000' }, { name: 'Swift', icon: , color: '#FA7343' }, { name: 'Kotlin', icon: , color: '#7F52FF' } ], frameworks: [ { name: 'React', icon: , color: '#61DAFB' }, { name: 'Angular', icon: , color: '#DD0031' }, { name: 'Vue.js', icon: , color: '#4FC08D' }, { name: 'Node.js', icon: , color: '#339933' }, { name: 'Django', icon: , color: '#092E20' }, { name: 'Laravel', icon: , color: '#FF2D20' }, { name: 'Spring', icon: , color: '#6DB33F' }, { name: '.NET', icon: , color: '#512BD4' } ], databases: [ { name: 'MongoDB', icon: , color: '#47A248' }, { name: 'PostgreSQL', icon: , color: '#336791' }, { name: 'MySQL', icon: , color: '#4479A1' }, { name: 'Redis', icon: , color: '#DC382D' } ], mobileDevelopment: [ { name: 'React Native', icon:
📱
, color: '#61DAFB' }, { name: 'Flutter', icon: , color: '#02569B' }, { name: 'Ionic', icon: , color: '#3880FF' }, { name: 'Cordova', icon: , color: '#E8E8E8' }, { name: 'Swift', icon: , color: '#FA7343' }, { name: 'Kotlin', icon: , color: '#7F52FF' } ], ecommerce: [ { name: 'Odoo', icon: , color: '#714B67' }, { name: 'WordPress', icon: , color: '#21759B' }, { name: 'Shopify', icon: , color: '#7AB55C' }, { name: 'Magento', icon: , color: '#EE6723' }, { name: 'OpenCart', icon: , color: '#2D5C88' }, { name: 'PrestaShop', icon: , color: '#DF0067' } ], cloudDevOps: [ { name: 'Docker', icon: , color: '#2496ED' }, { name: 'Kubernetes', icon: , color: '#326CE5' }, { name: 'AWS', icon: , color: '#FF9900' }, { name: 'Google Cloud', icon: , color: '#4285F4' }, { name: 'Azure', icon: , color: '#0078D4' }, { name: 'Firebase', icon: , color: '#FFCA28' } ] }; const services = [ { id: 1, icon: , title: "Custom Development from Scratch", subtitle: "Full-Cycle Development", description: "We offer full-cycle development services to build systems, applications, or websites from the ground up using any programming language that fits the project.", details: "From concept to deployment, we transform ideas into fully functional digital solutions designed for scalability and innovation.", features: [ "Custom system development", "Multi-language support", "Scalable architecture", "End-to-end solutions" ], popular: false }, { id: 2, icon: , title: "Ready-Made Systems by PMI IT", subtitle: "Pre-Built Solutions", description: "We provide a range of pre-built systems developed in-house, which can be customized to match your business needs.", details: "These solutions offer fast deployment, cost-efficiency, and high quality without compromising flexibility.", features: [ "Pre-built systems", "Customizable solutions", "Fast deployment", "Cost-effective" ], popular: true }, { id: 3, icon: , title: "Enterprise Solutions", subtitle: "Public & Private Sectors", description: "We specialize in building fully integrated systems for both government and private organizations, enabling centralized control and seamless connectivity across departments.", details: "Drive efficiency and support complete digital transformation with our enterprise-grade solutions.", features: [ "Government systems", "Private sector solutions", "Centralized control", "Digital transformation" ], popular: false } ]; return (

🔧 Our Services – PMI IT

Discover our comprehensive range of IT solutions designed to transform your business

{services.map((service) => (
{service.popular &&
Most Popular
}
{service.icon}

{service.title}

{service.subtitle}

{service.description}

{service.details}

Key Features:

    {service.features.map((feature, index) => (
  • ✓ {feature}
    • ))}
))}
{/* Technology Showcase Section */}

🛠️ Technologies We Master

Comprehensive expertise across all major programming languages, frameworks, and platforms

{/* Programming Languages */}

Programming Languages

{technologies.programmingLanguages.map((tech, index) => (
{tech.icon}
{tech.name}
))}

Frameworks & Libraries

{technologies.frameworks.map((tech, index) => (
{tech.icon}
{tech.name}
))}
{/* Mobile Development */}

Mobile Development

{tech.icon}
{tech.name}
))}
{/* E-commerce & CMS */}

E-commerce & CMS

{tech.icon}
{tech.name}
))}

Databases

{tech.name}
))}
{/* Cloud & DevOps */}

{tech.name}
))}
); }; export default Services;
